title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the "Close All Saved" feature does not always work. Specifically, when I create a new file (e.g., f1.txt) and then select "Close All Saved" from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: I expect that selecting "Close All Saved" from the file menu should close the file without prompting for saving since no changes have been made.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 
2. Create a new file (e.g., f1.txt). 
3. Select "Close All Saved" from the file menu.
